text: Facelina fragilis is a species of sea slug, an aeolid nudibranch, a marine gastropod mollusc in the family Facelinidae.MolluscaBase (2018). Facelina fragilis (Risbec, 1928). Accessed on 2018-02-17. ==Distribution== This species has been reported from New Caledonia.Risbec, J. 1953. Mollusques nudibranches de la Nouvelle Calédonie. Faune Union Française Paris, Libraire Larose, 15: 1-189. ==References== Category:Facelinidae Category:Gastropods described in 1928
title: Facelina fragilis
